website_summaries.verdict: This accordion-style shade fits windshields for a wide variety of cars and can be reversed to keep warm air in during the winter.
pros: Folds accordion style with Velcro strap closure
Reverses to keep warm air in on cold days
Stiff fabric stands up well against the windshield
Hook-and-loop strap offers compact storage when not in use
cons: Mirror slit may not work for cars with very low rearview mirrors

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful MEDIUM Windshield Sun Shade. (If you need jumbo, for large vechicle- look below in review for link to that)
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. Can put silver or red size forward. Edges do not fray or come apart. I replaced silver "bubble type" accordian with this. Looks much better. in my Explorer. Slides into and out of window easy. Nice design. Nothing to complain about if you pick the right one for your car. Now about the size- this is the MEDIUM. Some people with full size trucks are ticked off and putting low reviews because "this isn't quite big enough". No. Don't blame the product and leave a bad review. Read the details and order the JUMBO if you have a big windsheild:
customer_reviews.author: NiteShopping

customer_reviews.title: The shade itself seems like a nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The shade itself seems like a nice quality, thick and folds nicely. Good shape. Better than most of the cheaper versions. However the first time I ordered I received the wrong size so I had to exchange for a new size. Then the second one is damaged- with the closure strap ripped. Not a deal breaker. Honestly I'm too tired of returning it, so I'll just deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It would have been perfect for my car if the size is 54 X ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. I am using this on a 2009 Toyota Corolla. Its a bit short for my car. My visors are holding on to this shade by a mere quarter inch. Its actually not covering my whole dashboard. There's about 2 or 3 inches that it cannot cover. The size of this shade is 58" x 24". It would have been perfect for my car if the size is 54 X 28 instead. I am not complaining about the size. I mentioned it so you can have an idea how it would fit on a small car like my Toyota.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Y. C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality sunshade at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This sunshade fits my car very nice (1998 Lexus SC400). It is also reversible so that on cold winter days when you want to keep the interior warm, place the shade with the black side facing the windshield, so that sunlight can absorb into the cabin. On hot summer days, place it on the reflective side facing the windshield for heat dissipation. It has been about 5 months owning this product and it has been exceptional with its high quality build and effectiveness. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: William T

customer_reviews.title: If you decide to get the black one like I did just be prepared for it to get ...
customer_reviews.text: If you decide to get the black one like I did just be prepared for it to get hot, it is obviously going to absorb the heat. I only bought it because i looked nice and it does! It is pretty high quality compared to other products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Denise 🌸

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for an SUV
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my Toyota 4Runner, which has a shorter, more upright windshield. I can see how it might be a bit to short for a sedan with a long windshield. Easier to open/close than all the twisting (both of the shade and my upper body) of the pop-up wire/fabric shades. Velcro strap is also far superior to an elastic one that will stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: nicholsoak

customer_reviews.title: Useful for wide sindsheilds, and comes with a better strap
customer_reviews.text: This is a typical fan fold sun screen, with one nice exception - most fan fold screens have an elastic strap to hold it folder. This one has a Velcro strap that will work much, much better. As a side note, I bought the black sided one. The black side isn't reflective so it could be used in the winter to keep the interior of your vehicle a little warmer if you're parked facing the sun. Just a small point, I know.
customer_reviews.author: SameOldStoryTop Contributor: Arduino

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the car cool in the sun, but a bitch to put up
customer_reviews.text: There's no "suction power" and it's kind of a handle to put up because it's a lot wider than my car. I have to use the sun visor to prop it into place. My car is cooler when I get in after parking in the sun, so I guess it works as well as you would expect
customer_reviews.author: Lenna

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Size Chart
customer_reviews.text: Bought the largest size, thinking it would fit my 2012 Civic like the chart said, and as you can see, it doesn’t fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Marie Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made but very short in height
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I give low rating is due to the fact that this product was recommended to fit my 2016 malibu and it wasn't even close... they are super short and leave about a foot of space also they do not have suction cups.... If they did fit I would like them because quality wise they are nicely made, maybe wrong size or for a smaller windshield...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This product is very flimsy in structure. Although Amazon said it fits my 2018 Volkswagen Passat, it is a nuisance to fit within my window, ends bend. it just doesn't have the structure to satisfy a good fit. I used for 8 days, then put away in my closet, in case someone i know needs one. Total waste of money and use. Oh, and there were ZERO, NONE, suction cups included with this product. ANOTHER false information.
customer_reviews.author: Luvalo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on my 2019 Toyota 4Runner, I like the color cause it matches but when I take off the outside part that’s been taking the heat its really hot when you touch it that I have too be careful, it also is very stiff and not very bendable like the ones from the stores
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Thin, but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This window shade is smaller than my previous shade, which is an improvement because my Nissan Kicks's windshield isn't that large, and fits perfectly. I'm sure it will become less stiff over time, as the shade it replaced did, but it's plenty stiff now and works well. It also folds up to a perfect thickness that fits between my center console and the passenger seat when it's not in use. The black exterior-facing side of the shade looks great in my black car, too.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: GETS HOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update. Hot garbage. Bought one for my truck in April. Loved it... until recently when it no longer holds its form. Only took 5 months for it to break down. :( Am looking for two more covers because I bought one for my husbands vehicle and suspect the same thing is going to happen. Don't waste your money! Bought this one for my husband because I already have a blue one for my vehicle that I love. Fits perfect on his '13 4Runner. However, this cover gets extremely hot. I have actually burned my fingertips removing it. The blue one does not get as hot. We are looking for another one...
customer_reviews.author: Akeni

customer_reviews.title: In the house!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this in the house to block light from a window behind my desk. Certain times of the day during summer, I need a block across the lower part of the window. After months of propping binders against the glass, and considering making a little shoji screen (like a mini room divider screen), I thought of this. Left partly folded, it stands up fine, fits various lengths. Added bonus, it is like a thermal curtain, reflecting away the heat and light. Cheap solution that will last for years, I will fold it up and put in file drawer until next year.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptyk

customer_reviews.title: Generic Shade & Doesn't Fit Ram Truck Windshield.....not even close !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I filled out my Ram truck info for this shade believing this shade would be custom to my truck, but beware this is not custom to your vehicle and it did NOT fit my truck. The shade I received said Standard fits most cars. I do not have a car, I have a Ram 1500(what I inputted on the page). This shade fits a small car windshield, I could of bought a generic shade locally that fit. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Make America Great Again !

customer_reviews.title: After one use, I was confused and thought it was color changing shield
customer_reviews.text: After one use, the sunshield was already sunbleached. At first I thought it was a surprise feature that I didn't know about, that the color would come back after it cooled off but nooooo. From the first use you can tell where my registration and inspection stickers are and where the windshield is shaded. So why didn't I return it or complain? It's not worth my time or money to ship it back. It blocks the sun which is the main reason I bought it, the cute pink side was a bonus but obviously not worth it. I'm only leaving a review now because I was emailed requesting a review.
customer_reviews.author: Asil

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough!
customer_reviews.text: According to Amazon, this should fit my car (a Chevy Traverse), it does not though. It works okayish when it is cold, but any warm weather makes the material flimsy. I often walk to my car and see it has fallen. If you have a larger vehicle, be warned that this may not fit your car.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It is far too small for a Ford truck.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2016 Ford F150. Amazon even said it would fit my vehicle. No sir. It is not wide enough to cover the windshield. I have bought hundreds of things on Amazon over the years and this is the first time I have posted a negative review. The most frustrating part is that the cost to return it is almost as much as the shade cost itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mort

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: The sizing said it would fit my Ford Explorer but it wasn't even close to fitting. It was about 4 inches too narrow, even with putting the visors down it wouldn't stay in place. I was very disappointed since the reviews seem to say it was a good product. I'll be giving it away since I threw out the packaging so I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: For large car windshields unless your willing to fold it or cut it smaller
customer_reviews.text: I liked how large it is, but hated how large it is... This sunshade is large and thick, its pretty durable so it stays in the window. It's a bit too big for my car but It still works tho because I can just fold the extra parts of it over so it does the job. It did not fit my 2016 Toyota Prius perfectly, Amazon said it would fit, but for me it is good enough and I like that it matches my car.
customer_reviews.author: S.a.k

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with false advertising
customer_reviews.text: Terrible buy. Shade is half the size of my window although the ad states it fits my specific car. Now I have to make a trip to Kohl’s to return the item. I could have just gone to Pep Boys if I wanted to go to the store. But while I’m out at Kohl’s I will stop and pick up the correct item from a more reliable source. I do not recommend ordering this through delivery unless you just want to waste time and have nothing better to do than make a trip out to return it.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Does not fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this following the guide to find the accurate size for my 2005 Toyota. What I received was 4 -5 inches smaller from top to bottom. Sizing is all wrong and think they need to update it, as it is inaccurate. I suggest measuring your windshield before purchase. This will save you the hassle of returning it. I received a refund minus the shipping. I believe I shouldn’t even be responsible for that since it’s not an error on my part. Do not rely on their chart. Measure your windshield first!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Not for 2003 Tacoma, must be 23"
customer_reviews.text: I chose a 23" sunshade. Amazon blurts out "That's not for you truck!!!". So I figured 1" won't matter. I knew it was slightly more than 23" and just go for it as I can't find a 23" one in this town at any autoparts store (O'reilly, Autozone, NAPA - all are 27" 'bro truck!' size). Not even at Walmart superstore. Nope. So I got this. And it's too big. I can force it in there and it's better than the exfoliating one I had.
customer_reviews.author: asdf

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shade, far too small.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure of your window size before you order this shade. I bought it to use in a Lexus RX350 and there is no way this thing can be used. It is very short, only 24" tall, it does not even fit in my Xterra. Im not sure what window this fits, but if you have a windshield of any size, look elsewhere. As far as the quality of the shade goes, it is built very well, I sure wish it would have fit as it seems like it would outlast the life of the car.
customer_reviews.author: SapperCS

customer_reviews.title: This Is How a Sun Shade Should Be Made
customer_reviews.text: Update-everything else can be perfect, but if it doesn't fit who cares. That's right-it doesn't fit right. It hangs over the ends of the windshield, too wide. I just got my sun shade and this thing is made right. Folds up to a small package, had a perfect velcro closed retaining strap. and has two sides for either winter or summer. Seems to be made of quality material. I rate this as an overall win for me!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 2007 Honda Accord. Coverage was a little big and the shade was flimsy and thin. It seemed like it wouldn't hold up to constant daily use of folding/unfolding and positioning correctly in the window. I returned it. Also ,I needed this asap but it was delivered late. It was a prime delivery item therefore based on the purchase it was to be delivered in 1-2 days but it took over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E.

customer_reviews.title: Unlisted feature
customer_reviews.text: This thing is glittery and pink and definitely shades the interior of my vehicle. I have found a previously unmentioned feature though! When this baby warms up she smells like garlic! My hot car didn’t smell like garlic before I got this thing, and in cooler weather it’s not noticeable. But after a few hours of direct sun, climbing into my car is like stepping into a fine Italian restaurant! Why? How? I don’t know. It seems to originate at the fabric edging of the visor. I’m gonna keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Black

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I thought it might keep the car interior a little cooler. (My bad.) It does keep the interior metal parts from getting too hot to touch. My biggest complaint is that it doesn't really fit my Malibu. I lock it in place, put up both visors, and it still has fallen down while I was away from the car. What i really dislike is how much money I spent on it. Could've achieved the same result for half the money.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: All that glitter
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this wouldn't be very glittery or that the glitter would fall off. But the glory does not flake off at all and it's super glittery! The shade itself is pretty thick which is good for insulating. The only thing I noticed was the pink that's in direct sunlight faded pretty quickly but it's still glittery and just a faded pink so I'm still happy. I was pleasantly surprised when I got a second package with a steering wheel cover for buying the shade! Thanks guys. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Said it fits a SUV. My daughter has a 2008 Honda CRV and it won’t stay on. Too short/small. Not I can seem to return?? I have the same one for my Mercedes and it fits fine. I only bought a 2nd one because it says in the add it would fit. Bait & switch??
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Maniecki

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made does not fit my vehicle as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This shade was described as "fitting your 2020 Subaru Outlook". I made the mistake of thinking it meant that it was sized to my car. It is much too small for my car and only partially blocks the sun. I live in Nevada and a properly fitting shade protects the dashboard as well as keeping the heat index down. This is a junk product measured for a much smaller vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Retired LA cop

customer_reviews.title: Good, just a couple more inches and it'd be perfect
customer_reviews.text: It covers about 95% of the windshield. If it were a few inches taller, it would fit the window better. I don't know if this is because of the make and model, but I feel that most of the sun shades I buy are slightly smaller than the windshield. Other than that it does do its job of covering the sun's rays from scorching my car - it is several degrees lower in the car when I use this shade.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my already small car?
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for my windshield. I have a Ford focus so my car isn't big to begin with. It still does its job. You have to lean it on the sun visors in JUST the right way to keep it up, but sometimes it slips down and falls. Theres no suction idk what that was about. It does its job I guess, I just wish it was bigger. It's cute though. The pink has already faded in the sun but it faded to a baby pink, which I like when better than the hot pink it was before lol
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good shade but size problem
customer_reviews.text: The shade itself is pretty good, no issues with it, but the fit sucks. I have a 2014 4Runner and this is the designated size — but it’s too big, the height is about 2 inches too high. Because of that the shades end up folding down the top edge... still works but it’s sloppy and the folding of the edge makes it harder to refold the shade when putting it away. Gave 3 stars, if it fit like the description said it would I’d have given 5 stars. Is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: C-C

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is OFF...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit properly...There's nothin that will keep it in place from folding like an accordion once you place it in the windshield. This will NOT fit the 2013 Nissan Pathfinder model a the windshield is wider and longer in depth. almost like a cabin fwd design. I'd recommend going to a local autoparts store and buying this type of item. It would save you the time of waiting for something only to discover it's not the proper sizing. The description and sizing list states that this would fit my vehicle properly....Nope
customer_reviews.author: Ant_Live

customer_reviews.title: Check your own windshield size first.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shade, but doesn't fit CR-V 2013 despite Amazon saying it does. Nowhere could I find the right measurements of the car so yes I took a chance. Bad choice. Have to return it. Too small. Plus I have to pay for the return postage! Would be nice if manufacturer could provide a sizing chart like the stores. Oh well. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Really big shade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Mini Cooper, It didn’t fit. I searched for widow shades for Mini Coopers. I gave it to my dad for his full sized truck.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Be Aware - Motor Trend AS-311-RD
customer_reviews.text: The description does not fit the product. It states it will fit an SUV and did not cover even half of my windshield for my Lexus RX350. Please look else where and I cant return due to the COVID - 19 issue but will get my money back when Amazon customer support returns. I wish they had ZERO starts as even ONE star is too much for this flimsy product.
customer_reviews.author: Washington

customer_reviews.title: Medium STURDY coverage for a car, NOT a truck.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2016 Ford F-150 4x4 Sport/Supercrew Truck and it's too short for my windshield. It's NOT enough coverage at all! Sending back for sure. It's very nice and STURDY which I love BUT I NEED ALL my windshield covered cuz in WEST TEXAS HEAT, my truck gets super hot in the summer.... Nice RED color though.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and blocks the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Requires one end to be folded back on itself, but otherwise is a great fit for the 2020 Kia Soul. Bonus!!! The blue is a good match to my Soul in Neptune Blue
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: 2019 Honda HRV doesn’t fit very well.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed to say that it doesn’t fit in my 2019 Honda HRV very well its a little too short, it was advertised to be able to fit my car. When I come back to my car it’s fallen down and that’s with me trying to use my visors the best I can to prop it up. It keeps my car a little cooler but just doesn’t fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta B

customer_reviews.title: Quite small,  not fur mid & large SUVs
customer_reviews.text: It does "fit" my SUV windshield but it is quite small. I have a protector already that is slightly larger than this product that I will probably continue to use. I was hoping for something larger. For a car I think this would be a great product. The folds in it are quite extreme but I think after some use it will open more flat and work well. I like the blue color. Will probably keep and use in my husband's car when it isn't parked in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my window shade cover. The material seems sturdy. I love the color. The material is pretty thick. I love that it came with a cherry car freshener.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Too small & not flat enough
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2014 Toyota Corolla and Amazon said below the photos of the shade, “this fits your 2014 Toyota Corolla”, but it doesn’t. It won’t stay flat enough to span the entire windshield and is too narrow to be held in place by the two visors. It starts to accordion itself closed, making it too short.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The reflector itself seems good quality. It's a tad small for a long slanted coupe windshield (2013 Buick Regal), but the car is noticeably cooler on hot summer days. My main complaint is the velcro strap. It's too short, so you have to pull really tight to secure it, and it's already pulling out the stitching. If it was an inch longer, the problem would be solved.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with suction cups to help stay on the windshield. This product does not fit our 2016 Dodge Ram 1500, however at time of purchase it did specifically say it would fit. This solar shield barely fits the windshield and just falls down. Does not work. The only thing we do like is the color.
customer_reviews.author: the Mindful Wanderers

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit window properly
customer_reviews.text: When looking for a sun screen I specifically searched for a sun screen that said it would fit my Infinite Q50. This sun screen said it fit the bill. It does not. The notch to put the sun screen around the rear view mirror is not deep enough. In a Q50 the flop down window shades are relatively small. So with the small rear view mirror notch and small window shades it is impossible to get this sun screen to stay in place. Te sun screen is also to wide across the window. Seems like this shade is really designed for an SUV or truck, not a car.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley D. Hiquet

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit listed vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: This item was supposed to be compatible with my Chevy volt, 2017. It seems like the advertisement was just a list of common cars and not actually based on it the product would fit, it is way too small, and cannot ship back the way it was sent. Very dissatisfied. Waste of money! Color is pretty, quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sun shade, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shade that fit well in the windshield of my 2014 Subaru Legacy. A little awkward to get around the rear view mirror (it is notched, but notch could stand to be just a bit deeper for my car). Seems to be made of quality material, and so far no heat induced chemical "out-gassing" to fog the inside of the glass (like some cheaper shades, especially ones made of plastic or rubberized cloth). Beats the heck out of spending big bucks ($50-$80 or more) for a shade custom fitted to my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good on CRV
customer_reviews.text: I live in AZ and these are a necessity of life. Almost impossible to use as they will not stay in place and end up just draped over the steering wheel. Just got dash cover and that seems to help keep them from sliding around as much. Never again with this type of shade for SUV.
customer_reviews.author: heatstroke

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I own a 2015 Chevy Trax and wanted a nice looking sunshade for it. I found this one because the reviews seemed good and I liked the design and look of the shade. It's a decent size width wise but the hight was just barely enough to reach from the bottom of the windshield up to the bottom of my sun visors. I ended up returning it for a custom sized one that would fit my car exactly.
customer_reviews.author: S.Amicucci

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for 2020 Ford Escape
customer_reviews.text: This does not stay in the windshield of a 2020 Ford Escape. The notch where the rearview mirror goes is not big enough. The sun visors will not hold it in place either as they don't come down far enough due to the notch for the rearview mirror not being deep enough. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: N. Little

customer_reviews.title: Covers window easily
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and set up in the windshield. You do need to use your visors to keep it on place. Folds up easily with a strap to keep it contained for easy storage. Only downside I've noticed is that the pink is quickly fading from the sun, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nat05

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this for my 2020 Subaru Forester and Amazon Garage had recommended it would fit my windshield, which is technically true, however it just barely fits. I have to balance it on my visors just right in order to make it work. I thought about returning it and going with a bigger size but it didn't seem like it was work it. Double check the size of your windshield before buying. Other than that it works great and creates a noticeable difference in temperature in this obnoxious Las Vegas heat.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Torosian

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my Ford Edge windshield. The center "dip" where the rearview mirror goes, doesn't "dip" far enough. So the sides of the shade can't come up far enough to allow the visors to hold the shade up. Ultimately, this shade is just to small for my windshield. The shade itself is well made though.
customer_reviews.author: May Sams

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave three stars its because its way too small, too small for my honda insight 2019. My car Its the same size as a honda civic or accord. This sunshade would only fit a mini cooper or fiat honestly not even a bmw like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Vann E.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit my Jeep
customer_reviews.text: The sun shade is very wide side to side, not long enough from top to bottom. Pretty disappointed. I highly recommend not purchasing for a Jeep.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomr

customer_reviews.title: Hard keeping it up, always falling down
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t really fit my car. Kept on falling off from the top which beats the purpose of having this. It did help a little bit when it’s in the blazing sun, but when it falls down, it’s totally useless. I was really hoping it could stay all the way up and cover the whole windshield. Having it is better than none tho.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA Z

customer_reviews.title: It fits
customer_reviews.text: I'm VERY pleased and happy with my new window shades, my windshield is huge and makes my car VERY, VERY hot. When I got this I put it in as soon as I could and the fact that it covers the ENTIRE windshield, in 1 hrs time my car was significantly cooler and for that I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mandacakes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for new Honda CRV 2020. It said it would fit this car. It seems too long and too short for the windshield. I tried to use the visors to hold down and it slips right out from under. Pretty unhappy with this. I wanted an easier one to get on and out. I’ll be referring back to the pop up ones I had for a previous car.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. Was listed as compatible with my VW CC but not even close. It was six inches too short, too wide and got extremely hot just trying to place it in the window. It doesn't seem right that it should be scorching hot within one minute. Too expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: JambiJ

customer_reviews.title: they fit perfect for my two trucks
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and when I got the products, they fit perfect for my two trucks. When I did a search for Toyota Tacoma Shipping was fast and when I got the products, they fit perfect for my two trucks. When I did a search for 2017 Toyota Tacoma tacoma and 1992 pickup, These products came up. I like how height isnt too tall and width is too wide, its perfect for Tacomas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Junior S.

customer_reviews.title: small sunshade
customer_reviews.text: I live in Las Vegas and also could not find the small sunshade here . First it does seem to be of good quality. It is a half and inch too high 23.5" would be just right. Luckily I did get the correct size though, other review got the long one by mistake.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parsells

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: THIS DOES NOT WORK FOR A CHEVY CRUZE. IT IS TOO SHORT TO REACH THE BOTTOM OF THE WINDSHIELD AND THE VISORS TO ANCHOR IT IN PLACE.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was wrong
customer_reviews.text: The shield itself is ok, but short about 7" shorter than the windshield height. The result is it doesn't stay even when visorS are down to catch it. Will return when lockdown is lifted. This is definitely Amazon fault when it says item will fit my car.
customer_reviews.author: lazybuyer

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This does not fit a 2019 Honda CR-V. It is too short, from top to bottom, and will not sufficiently cover the window. Otherwise it is fine. I am giving it one star for the incorrect advertisement. At $12 it is not worth returning, but it does leave me unsatisfied as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Dake

customer_reviews.title: Looked Great - Didn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2017 Camry and the online tool through Amazon stated it would fit my vehicle. Well, it didn't. It was too short to be held up by the visors. I was able to use this in my 2000 Ford Ranger and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowChaser

customer_reviews.title: Feels very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I like the accordion style like this. I usually get just a cardboard ones from the Walmart or something. This is a lot stiffer. Have to kind of break it in around the mirrors in Corners to make it easier to install. I fold it up and put it in between the seats. Definitely feels heavy duty like it should last a few years. I can recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely will Not fit pick ups
customer_reviews.text: The color was the only thing I liked about this .I specifically ordered this for my 2007 F150 pick up and it looks like it might work on a Toyota Tercel .these small matters is what will take me from any future purchases with Amazon ..
customer_reviews.author: Roguelement

customer_reviews.title: The best sunshade out there.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I found this sunshade. It is a good fix for my GMC Canyon pickup and my wife’s Cadillac XT5. It is more rigid than most sunshades. It does not crumple, but remains in place and folds away nicely. I have bought 3 of them. To my mind, they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Staine

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The sizing of this thing is way off. I had a precious sun shade that fit and worked great. Ordered the same size and this thing doesn’t even fit the full size of my windshield. About 5 inches from the top for sun to come through. It’s basically useless. It also bends way too easy and is difficult to even put up.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: If u have a 2020 Tacoma and can’t find a sunshade to fit ur very small windshield then this is for you. I searched high and low and couldn’t find one to fit the small windshield on my Tacoma. I also didn’t want to spend $40-60 dollars on a custom made one. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Toner

customer_reviews.title: Its doesn't even work!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful product. Wont stay up In windshield. just falls down as you pit it up. Theres no "suction power" what so ever. And in top of everything it said it would fit my car specifically and it doesn't even black out the whole windshield. this is the worst thing I've ever paid for and I it sucks how I wont be able to get a refund for it. Thanks for the 20 dollar piece of foil and paper you gave me. I'll make sure to let everyone know there is no quality in your products and they're just cheaply made. Awful product. Bad product. never will I buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Volanti

customer_reviews.title: Does not fix 2019 Ford Fiesta
customer_reviews.text: Page shows it is a fix for my 2019 Ford Fiesta but it's not able to cover the last 10 inches . Will not even reach the flip shades
customer_reviews.author: John A Milks

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: When you order this product it asks for your vehicle make, model, and year. It then tells you if they have one to fit your specific car. I put all that information in, and when I got the product it doesn’t fit at all. Length wise (passenger side to driver side) is way to long. And then from bottom of window to top, it’s way to short, my sun visors don’t even hold it. I think the product itself is pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It folds up; it shades the dash
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how suction power or warmth were involved in this sun shade. I was trying to avoid warmth. It mounts by being held up by the windshield visors. There were no suction cups. It folds up for storage. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Way too short
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what kind of car this is for. But it isn’t long enough to stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Just don’t bother. Not only did it not fit the vehicle it was allegedly the right size for, but it’s flimsy, glorified bubble wrap. Someone, somewhere *should be* ashamed of themselves for ripping people off.
customer_reviews.author: S. Locker

customer_reviews.title: replaced my old shade with this one
customer_reviews.text: I used to got one from super market. It works but won't last. however, this shade from Amazon is much sturdy than what I expected. I had a 2016 outback and this shade is wider than my windshield. Good coverage, but not so good to put it up.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Needs visor loops to keep it in place
customer_reviews.text: It would help tremendously if this shade had elastic loops at the top to place around the sun visors. Without them, it is hard to keep this shade in place, as it keeps slipping from under the visors. I have sewn on my own elastic loops, and now it works really well. It keeps the heat out very well once it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Odd shape
customer_reviews.text: Odd shape and stiff, the Motor Trend sun shade is too wide and too short for my car. No matter what I tried, the sun shade would not stay up. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: F. C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: new shade for new car
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old sunshade, bent and with stretched out elastic, with this one. It has a velcro closing to hold it together when not in use. It is pretty stiff so it doesn't get bent as easily either. Oh, and it is great at blocking the sun out and keeping the steering wheel and seats cooler in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Rav 4.
customer_reviews.text: This fits my RAV4 2018 perfectly. Love the black as it’s sleek and doesn’t bring a lot of attention to my car. I needed this to keep the sun off my steering wheel as it’s starting to peel & I’ve only had the car for two years. Boo. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Bends Easy/Still Cool
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have an all black new car and wanted to keep the asthetics on point. This looks amazing in our 2018 Honda Accord. I gave 4 stars because we don’t treat this item roughly and it has already bent pretty severely when we wrap it up each time we take it off the windshield. It still looks good when used so I would say go ahead and buy it, but remember that it’s not incredibly sturdy like other brands I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Landers

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover windshield
customer_reviews.text: I gave this cover one star! With my wife holding the cover against the passenger pillar you can see how much of a gap it leaves at the driver pillar. And with the cover at the base of the windshield, visors extended, they are not tall enough to even reach the visors.I did use the amazon fitment to ensure I purchased the correct shade for my truck.The truck is a 2013 ram 2500 hd diesel. With that being said, the cover is very well constructed, just falls very short for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Koelman

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this windshield sun shade. It fits, it folds & unfolds easily, it seems sturdy, & it definitely helps to keep the interior of my car cooler. I use it with the silver side facing the outside during the summer. I seriously don't know why more people don't use these things!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hope Schoenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Well Shaded
customer_reviews.text: This shade works well for my 2012 Honda Ridgeline, its approximately 3inches short in width from right-to-left but does a great job of keeping out the sun. The car is noticeably cooler as I get in but still hot, shade is enough to keep the edge off. Note: the indent for the rearview mirror will not work for cars with very low rearview mirrors (typically rearview with sensors).
customer_reviews.author: CoolPlace

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2016 Ford Escape
customer_reviews.text: This screen did not fit my 2016 Ford Escape even though the chart on Amazon said that it would fit. Also, there's no suction for this screen, so you'll have to rely on your shades to keep it in place. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Marley RS

customer_reviews.title: Good product that’s well made and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, however, it’s not for all cars. Measure your window first, y’all. I didn’t realize how deep my window was until I tried using this. Lesson learned on my part...don’t make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my 2014 Nissan Altima S
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine for the price. It does good it blocking the heat. It is pretty thick than what I bought from Walamrt. The only downside is - it is too small for my car windshield. So it falls once in a while. I have to make sure that I have to bring it closer to the upper side of the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Stains Car’s Sun Visors
customer_reviews.text: Works great to block the sun out and easy storage in your vehicle, however, after about a month of using I noticed my sun visors started turning red. (I ordered the red shade) The photos are from about 4months of use. And now my driver side sub visor won’t even stay up. I’m not sure if it’s the heat from the sun being reflected off the shade, but just thought that was odd. My vehicle isn’t super old either, 2016 Mazda CX-5.
customer_reviews.author: Korbin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then advertised
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt cover the windshield for 2011 Honda Civic Ex nor does it even hold in place.
customer_reviews.author: ayeekevinn

customer_reviews.title: Car guide for sunshade DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: This sunshade DID NOT FIT MY CAR despite the guide on this page that said it would. I actually trusted Amazon would have this on here working but IT DOES NOT. Ti.e to return this sunshade for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: FIG

customer_reviews.title: This sun shade DOES NOT work for my 2016 Honda Fit.
customer_reviews.text: This shade looks great and appears to be very sturdy. But it is too short to work on my Honda Fit. If I put the bottom of the shade at the bottom of the windshield, it’s too short to reach the sun visors to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Works great, excellent service
customer_reviews.text: This screen works great and is just what i needed. The customer service reps were the best when I had questions. Top notch people at this seller. The only downside is I received no suction cups. I dont know if they were supposed to come with these. It asks for a rating for doing review and its also stated in instructions in package. Regardless, I dont need them for my vehicle but for the other vehicle they would be nice as its a wider windshield and doesn't sit to well. Either way, great product and great people.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Kept my car a lot cooler this summer.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how it just fit my windshield and it stayed in place very well. I used it a lot because of the hot days we've had this summer. It really kept the car from getting too hot even in 80 and above weather.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. McMannus

customer_reviews.title: Fades In First Use
customer_reviews.text: I live in sunny California, so I couldn't wait to get this! The first use with direct sunlight, the whole thing faded! The pretty pink base color fades completely to like a white-silverish color. I guess I'll keep using it tho.....
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: sparkles
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this fun sun shade because of the color and glitter, it is a good shade but it does not fit the windshield of my Ford Escape. The height of it is way to short. I have to bend the corners for it to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Reni

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately this doesn't fit a GMC Terrain 2017
customer_reviews.text: Likely doesn't fit the other 2010-2016 first generation Terrains either. Too tall. Center V slot is too small to slip under the rearview mirror. I was going to return it but I ended up giving it to my nephew since it fit his 2004 Saturn Vue.
customer_reviews.author: wininchatsworth

product_meta.title: Motor Trend Front Windshield Sun shade - Accordion Folding Auto Sunshade for Car Truck SUV 58 x 24 Inch (Gray) - AS-311-GR_am
product_meta.description: Color:GrayDouble Bubble premium construction with reflective backing auto shade is a great way to protect your vehicle from the scorching heat or simply to protect your vehicle from the constant UV rays. Featuring dual usage (front and back). provides privacy in your vehicle. Our shades are constructed with your vehicle in mind. Fits most sedans, trucks and vans. The fan fold construction and the side Velcro allows the shades to be easily stored when not in use. Car Windshield Sun Shade - Blocks UV Rays Sun Visor Protector, Sunshade to Keep Your Vehicle Cool and Damage Free, Easy to Use, Fits Windshields of Various SizesKeep your car interior cool while also adding a stylish look. Tapered edges are great for a more snug fit to your windshield. Deep cutout also allows for rear view mirror fit. The high quality insulated bubble foil protects and cools your car's interior. This car sunshade features a dual-layer reflective design that is reversible and can conveniently be used on either side. The sun shade will protect your cars interior from harmful UV rays, which can cause your car to discolor and deteriorate. PremiumWindshield Auto Sun Shade FeaturesProtects vehicle interior from major sun damageKeep your interior cooler by reducing temperature by about 30 to 50 degrees. Protects LCD screens, GPS devices, and other electronicsEliminates dashboard fading and crack formationCompact accordion folding design allow for easy storage in glove compartment or door pocketEasily pops open and installs in seconds, safe, and convenient to use!
feature_bullets: TOP QUALITY FITMENT - Size: 58" Width x 24" Height. Universally made for most personal vehicles and fits the windshield using the rear-view mirror as support. The tapered edges allow for a more snug fit.

COMFORTABLE COOL INTERIOR - On a typical sunny day, avoid the extra heat and keep your interior cool with our top quality Windshield Sunshade Protector. Reduces interior car temperatures by 30-50 degrees. Blocks damaging UV rays; Keeps car cooler on sunny days

GREAT FOR CAR VAN TRUCK SUV - Increases the lifespan of your vehicle's dash surface, radio, LCD Screen, GPS Devices and other electronics. Unique design with a lightweight, reinforced frame simplifies application and re-positioning
100% UV PROTECTION - Dual-Layer Bubble design for maximum protection for your vehicle's interior, keeping your seats and steering wheel cool by blocking the sun's heat and harmful UV radiation rays.

QUICK AND EASY SETUP / REVERSIBLE- The foldable accordion design allows you to prop the sunshade up with ease and fold-away storage with a velcro closure. It can also be reversed and used on both sides with the same protection!
